item.title: Broken electronics goods dumped in park, 4th August
item.description:

item.title: Bag of rubbish on corner of Eglinton Rd and Herbert Road, 4th August
item.description:
A large carrier bag of rubbish has been left next to the BT junction box on the corner of Eglinton Road and Herbert Road. If I had a wheelie bin I would put it, but I don't.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Herbert Road, Shooters Hill, London

item.title: Diversion sign on pavement, 4th August
item.description:
"Diversion Ends" sign on pavement at width restriction in Auckland Road near corner with Belvedere Road. It's been there a few weeks although there are no apparent diversions in the area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 68, Belvedere Road, Crystal Palace, London
